water: Yucca is a drought tolerant plant. Allow the top half of the soil to dry before watering thoroughly. Be careful not to overwater.

soil: Air plants do not require soil
water: Submerge in filtered water for 2-3 hours once every two weeks, or mist lightly every few days. Use filtered water or rain water, as air plants are sensitive to cholorine and other additives found in tap water.
fertilizer: Use a liquid fertilizer specifically formulated for air plants.
